personal-info-desc: In this section, you can see and update your personal information.
upload-desc: In this section, you can your upload documents.
view-letters-desc: View letters about your CDCP application.
view-cdcp-desc: In this section, you can see any messages that were sent to you.
view-my-application-desc: In this section, you can see the status of current or past applications for the Canadian Dental Care Program
subscribe-desc: In this section, you can subscribe to the email alerts for CDCP, Any time you have a new message, you will be alerted.
